import React, { handleChange, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Row, Col, InputGroup, Form, Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; const ManufacturerModal = () => { const [modalState, setModalState] = useState("manufacturerModal" | "serviceModal" | "contactModal" | "confirmationModal" | "close") state = {isHidden: true} toggleHidden = ()=>this.setState((prevState)=>({isHidden: !prevState.isHidden})) const handleShowManufacturerModal = () => { setModalState("manufacturerModal") } const handleShowServiceModal = () => { setModalState("serviceModal") } const handleShowContactModal = () => { setModalState("contactModal") } const handleShowConfirmationModal = () => { setModalState("confirmationModal") } const handleClose = () => { setModalState("close") } return ( <> Konfigurator servisa
Korak 1. Odaberite proizvodaca vaseg vozila
Konfigurator servisa

Imam kupon { showCoupon ? : null }

Korak 4. Pregled i potvrda vaseg odabira
 ); } export default ManufacturerModal;
